name: Portfolio for Developers Concept V.2
description:
This is a Developers Portfolio design concept V.2. It replicates Visual Studio Code and can be used as your own CV!


The design is completely ✨FREE ✨ for use.


A few important things to mention:


👉 There are 4 pages in the file - Main Design, Style Guide, Components, and License

👉 You will find some comments for the developers that will help you during the development process

👉 You can modify and add/remove elements

👉 There is a custom Snake game design, but there is also a second option for the people who will decide not to use/develop it

👉 The design also includes mobile views

👉 There is a Discord channel where you can ask questions about the design or the development part. You can show your progress, and collaborate with other developers and designers. Or you just can join and say “Hi”. Link: https://discord.gg/tctuajXG
